member.name: T:C1.Win.Schedule.C1ScheduleStorage
member.summary: The component handles all data operations for the scheduler control and contains specific data storages for appointments, resources, contacts, owners, labels and statuses, which are used for binding different collections to the data. The component also handles data importing and exporting to other scheduling formats such as binary, iCal, and XML.

member.summary: Occurs when system time has been changed.

member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.
